msbt.message: Sorry I wasn't much fun to hang out with last time. Turns out bein' sick takes a lot out of you, .But brought some medicine over and I'm feelin' WAY better now, so it's all good.
Oh, you're back! Surprised to see me up and kickin', ?I owe it all to the medicine that brought. It's got me ready to take on the world again!

Yo, thanks so much for stopping by my place the other day. That meant a lot to me.Sorry I was kind of a drag to be around, but that's life when you're sick, .The good news is, brought me some medicine. My spirits are higher than ever!
Hey, I wanted to say it was cool of you to stop in and check on me the other day, .Afterward, I took some medicine that brought me, so now I'm back in business!

Ugh, I've been sick like you wouldn't believe. You coulda cooked an egg on me up till a while ago.The medicine got me is helping a lot though. I'd still be zonked out without it.Don't be like me, . If you ever feel sick, do somethin' about it first thing.

I was feelin' gross all day until showed up with some medicine. Now I'm way better.Guess everyone's gotta get sick sometime, but I could probably stand to be better about some stuff.Likewashing my hands after doin' my gardeningor not eatin' food I've had for more than two years

I hate to admit it, but I was sick as it gets the other day.I'd still be out of it without the medicine hooked me up with, .I go pretty hard all day, every day but I gotta remember to slow it down sometimes too.

I had a bad fever the other day. Don't worry, fixed me up with some medicine, but woof!I gotta take better care of myself From now on, I'm gonna wear a face mask when I work on my bike!Those fumes probably weren't doin' me any favors, huh, ?
That medicine you brought me saved my biscuits for real, .I was dizzy even lyin' down for a while there. I owe you big time, .
Yeeaahmaybe I oughta start a medicine stockpile at home.I thought I could likeWILL myself to get better. Turns out it doesn't work like that.Anyway, thanks, .
I figured bein' sick was all in the mind, right? So if I concentrated on getting better, it'd go away.Well, that was pretty dumb of me. I just needed some medicine, .
